title: Transparent City Service Copilot
one_liner: RAG + policy graph assistant for public-facing service questions with audit trails.
motivation: Residents struggle to navigate city services; agencies need transparent, verifiable answers.
proposed_approach: Ingest policy manuals, build a citation-aware retrieval system, add human-in-the-loop review for high-risk responses.
potential_impact: Faster service resolution, improved public trust, and measurable accuracy with auditability.
ip_note: Public disclosure to establish prior art before implementation.

title: Spatial Risk Early-Warning System
one_liner: GeoAI pipeline that fuses census, climate, and infrastructure data to prioritize interventions.
motivation: Communities need proactive insight into environmental or infrastructure risk patterns.
proposed_approach: Develop spatial feature store, train predictive risk models, and expose insights via a map-based dashboard.
potential_impact: Supports data-driven planning, resource allocation, and equitable response strategies.
ip_note: Drafted for visibility and collaboration outreach.
